41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Mughirah bin Shu'bah:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Whoever narrates a Hadith from me which he knows is a lie, then he is one of the liars

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ رَوَى حَدِيثًا، وَهُوَ يَرَى أَنَّهُ كَذِبٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Whoever Reports A Hadith Which Knows Is A Lie
